info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 07 at 8:28AM CDT until July 07 at 8:45AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL COMANCHE...SOUTHWESTERN STEPHENS...COTTON AND EASTERN TILLMAN COUNTIES... At 828 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles east of Lawton to 3 miles southwest of Chattanooga, moving southeast at 35 mph. Wind gusts near 70 mph have been reported with this storm. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Lawton, Duncan, Walters, Cache, Elgin, Comanche, Geronimo, Grandfield, Temple, Chattanooga, Randlett, Medicine Park, Indiahoma, Devol, Faxon, Hollister, Loveland, Corum, Cookietown, and Fort Sill. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
